nodes.text: The Plug-8G 927 Cluster Array Podracer was a massive twin-turbined model of podracer produced by Vokoff-Strood. The vehicles top speed was 775 kilometers per hour (481 miles per hour) and was 9 meters (29.7 feet) long. The Nuknog podracer Ark Roose flew a Plug-8G 927 Cluster Array Podracer at the Boonta Eve Classic in 32 BBY.
